Nvidia expands its reach in China's EV sectorNvidia said four Chinese electric vehicle brands will use its technology as the brains for automated driving systems, underscoring the U.S. chip maker's determination to expand in China despite Washington's tighter export rules. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:44:55 GMT X3JJZUX555II3N4LGXSVUOZPZM https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidia-expands-its-reach-chinas-ev-sector-2024-01-08/Joseph White商业带电
French cognac makers hit back at Chinese anti-dumping probeFrench cognac makers have hit back at claims by China that they are dumping brandy in the Chinese market, saying the price discounts alleged are unusually small for such a formal investigation. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 10:52:01 GMT J2AJPLH6XVMOTIIWBXBPIOOSOI https://www.reuters.com/business/french-cognac-makers-hit-back-chinese-anti-dumping-probe-2024-01-08/Reuters商业
STATBOX Soccer-Asian Cup Group B - Australia, Uzbekistan, Syria, IndiaStatbox on Group B at the Asian Cup, which will be held in Qatar from Jan. 12 to Feb. 10: Mon, 08 Jan 2024 10:14:23 GMT 4IL6V3H3MRK3JLAWLDNTT2TWQ4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/statbox-soccer-asian-cup-group-b-australia-uzbekistan-syria-india-2024-01-08/Reuters运动的足球
Exclusive: China closes local government offshore financing loophole -sourcesChinese regulators have closed a regulatory loophole that last year allowed heavily indebted local government financing vehicles (LGFVs) to further increase their borrowing, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 10:12:59 GMT YHCWRRYLU5LYLAMNNHWLDEHCCU https://www.reuters.com/markets/rates-bonds/china-tells-lgfvs-stop-issuing-offshore-364-day-bonds-sources-2024-01-08/Reuters市场利率与债券
STATBOX Soccer-Asian Cup Group C - Iran, UAE, Palestine, Hong KongStatbox on Group C at the Asian Cup, which will be held in Qatar from Jan. 12 to Feb. 10: Mon, 08 Jan 2024 10:10:43 GMT APTMLYKVLJKXXK7C2BBIEPNK3I https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/statbox-soccer-asian-cup-group-c-iran-uae-palestine-hong-kong-2024-01-08/Reuters运动的足球
Apple iPhone sales in China fall 30% in first week of 2024 - JefferiesApple 's iPhone sales in China dropped by 30% in the first week of 2024, Jefferies analysts said in a note, adding to signs of growing competitive pressures from domestic rivals such as Huawei (HWT.UL) for the U.S. tech giant. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:34:05 GMT LFD32BBDGBPG3ECVAZCZDDUMPI https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-iphone-sales-china-fall-30-first-week-2024-jefferies-2024-01-08/Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh技术
China to conduct live firing drills in East China Sea on Jan 8-9China will conduct live firing drills in some areas in the East China Sea from 10 a.m. (0200 GMT) to 3 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, according to the China maritime safety administration. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:35:45 GMT 7Y4A4TFDVZPYTCIHT5JKXBW6HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-conduct-live-firing-drills-east-china-sea-jan-8-9-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Nvidia to launch China-focused AI chip in Q2 2024 - sourcesU.S. chipmaker Nvidia plans to begin mass production in the second quarter of 2024 of an artificial intelligence (AI) chip it designed for China to comply with U.S. export rules, two people familiar with the matter said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 07:44:44 GMT 6UI3WL7GNJKJPAU45WXT4J3USI https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidia-launch-china-focused-ai-chip-q2-2024-sources-2024-01-08/Yelin Mo, Fanny Potkin技术被破坏
Geely's Zeekr aims to double its EV deliveries in 2024Zeekr is aiming to deliver 230,000 cars in 2024, double its deliveries in 2023, a company spokesperson said on Monday, as the electric car brand of China's Geely (GEELY.UL) ramps up sales of new models and expand into overseas markets. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:55:44 GMT S3VMFOHNZRJ3ZF5FJL3V2TVDLA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/geelys-zeekr-aims-sell-230000-evs-2024-double-2023-deliveries-2024-01-08/Reuters商业带电
Exclusive: China regulators lift stock net-selling ban for mutual fundsChina's securities regulator is allowing mutual fund managers to sell more shares than they buy each day, three sources said, removing a ban introduced late last year aimed at propping up a flagging stock market. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:12:51 GMT JIMQVR2ADNM77CFKBM5SCFJGU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-regulators-lift-stock-net- sell-ban-mutual-funds-sources-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
